Message.Title: Dell is worth $300 per share.
Message.Msg: Dell earns about $3 per share free cash flow on average. Over 100 years that amounts to $300 the yeild will increase with inflation. A safe low estimate of Dell valuation is $300 . It does not include the present assets which are large. Only a complete moron would sell to allow to go private.

Topic.Title: Icahn stub and warrant and blah blah blah typical wall street slick thievery.......

Message.Msg: Only a complete moron would not take $14 instead of $13.65.

Topic.Title: How many Proxy Solicitation Mailings did you get so far?

Message.Msg: Yeah all these mailings Dell could have ponied up another 50c and would have got my vote, now I am voting with Ichan no no no

Message.Title: Look at June 18 Volume of 99 Million Shares Compared to Usual Under 20 Million
Message.Msg: That was Carl choking on his additional 72 million share purchase for a total 152.5 million shares. Carl sure wants to own this lousy business.

Message.Title: Vote is June 18th, when will we hear the results?
Message.Msg: The vote for 13.65/share is taking place this Thursday. When will the results be announced and is that vote public?
